text:
#KKR kit

variables:
	{%player%.weapon} = 0
	{%player%.armor} = 0
	{%player%.magic} = 0
	{%player%.} = 0
	{%player%.} = 0
	{%player%.} = 0
	{%player%.} = 0
	{%player%.} = 0
	{%player%.} = 0

on click with book:
	name of player's tool contains "&e&lRPG"
	wait 1 tick
	execute console command "/rpgmenu %player%"

command /rpgmenu <player=%player%>:
	permission: admin
	trigger:
		open chest with 1 row named "&4&lKKR RPG" to arg 1
		wait 1 tick
		command "/playsound minecraft:entity.arrow.hit_player ambient %arg 1% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 0.5 1.0"
		format slot 3 of arg 1 with book named "&e&l" to run [execute console command "/buymenu %arg 1%]
		format slot 5 of arg 1 with book named "&e&l" to run [execute console command "/custommenu %arg 1%]
		stop

command /buymenu <player=%player%>:
	permission: admin
	trigger:
		open chest with 3 row named "&4&lKKR " to arg 1
		wait 1 tick
		command "/playsound minecraft:entity.arrow.hit_player ambient %arg 1% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 0.5 1.0"
		format slot 0 of arg 1 with arrow named "&e&lbuy &6&lArmor &a[&bLv.&e1&a]" to run [execute console command "/buyarmor %arg 1% 1"]
		format slot 9 of arg 1 with arrow named "&e&lbuy &b&lweapon &a[&bLv.&e1&a]" to run [execute console command "/buyweapon1 %arg 1% 1"]
		format slot 18 of arg 1 with arrow named "&e&lbuy &5&lmagic &a[&bLv.&e1&a]" to run [execute console command "/buymagic %arg 1% 1"]
		stop

#
command /buyarmor <player=%player%> <number>:
	trigger:
		wait 2 tick
		if arg 2 is 1:
			open chest with 1 row named "&4&lKKR buy Armor Lv.1" to arg 1
			wait 1 tick
			command "/playsound minecraft:entity.arrow.hit_player ambient %arg 1% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 0.5 1.0"
			if {%player%.} is true:
				format slot 0 of arg 1 with light green glass named "&6 &e" to close
			else:
				format slot 0 of arg 1 with leather_tunic named "&6" with lore "&a:&e||&6Gold:&60" to run [execute console command "/armorbuy %arg 1%  -1 g -1"]
			if {%player%.} is true:
				format slot 1 of arg 1 with light green glass named "&6 &e" to close
			else:
				format slot 1 of arg 1 with feather named "&6" with lore "&a:&e||&6Gold:&60" to run [execute console command "/armorbuy %arg 1%  -1 g -1"]
			stop


command /buyweapon <player=%player%> <number>:
	trigger:
		wait 2 tick
		if arg 2 is 1:
			open chest with 1 row named "&4&lKKR buy Weapon Lv.1" to arg 1
			wait 1 tick
			command "/playsound minecraft:entity.arrow.hit_player ambient %arg 1% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 0.5 1.0"
			if {%player%.} is true:
				format slot 0 of arg 1 with light green glass named "&b &e" to close
			else:
				format slot 0 of arg 1 with wooden_sword named "&b" with lore "&a:&e||&6Gold:&60" to run [execute console command "/weaponbuy %arg 1%  -1 g -1"]
			if {%player%.} is true:
				format slot 1 of arg 1 with light green glass named "&b &e" to close
			else:
				format slot 1 of arg 1 with wooden_axe named "&b" with lore "&a:&e||&6Gold:&60" to run [execute console command "/weaponbuy %arg 1%  -1 g -1"]
			stop

command /buymagic <player=%player%> <number>:
	trigger:
		wait 2 tick
		if arg 2 is 1:
			open chest with 1 row named "&4&lKKR buy Magic Lv.1" to arg 1
			wait 1 tick
			command "/playsound minecraft:entity.arrow.hit_player ambient %arg 1% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 0.5 1.0"
			if {%player%.} is true:
				format slot 0 of arg 1 with light green glass named "&5 &e" to close
			else:
				format slot 0 of arg 1 with enchanted_book named "&5" with lore "&a:&e||&6Gold:&60" to run [execute console command "/magicbuy %arg 1%  -1 none -1"]
			if {%player%.} is true:
				format slot 1 of arg 1 with light green glass named "&5 &e" to close
			else:
				format slot 1 of arg 1 with enchanted_book named "&5" with lore "&a:&e||&6Gold:&60" to run [execute console command "/magicbuy %arg 1%  -1 none -1"]
			stop

#number1
command /armorbuy <player=%player%> <text> <number> <text> <number>:
	permission: admin
	trigger:
		if arg 3 < {%arg 1%.g}:
			if arg 5 < {%arg 1%.%arg 4%}:
				set {%arg 1%.%arg 2%} to true
				remove arg 5 from {%arg 1%.%arg 4%}
				remove 1 from {%arg 1%.%arg 4%}
				remove arg 3 from {%arg 1%.g}
				remove 1 from {%arg 1%.g}
				broadcast "&e&l%arg 1%&a &6&l%arg 2% &a"
				message " " to arg 1
				message "&e&l%arg 2%&a" to arg 1
				message "&aarmor" to arg 1
				message " " to arg 1
				command "/playsound minecraft:entity.player.levelup ambient %arg 1% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 0.53 1.0"
				command "/playsound minecraft:entity.firework.launch ambient @a ~ ~ ~ 1.0 1.3 1.0"
			else:
				message "&4" to arg 1
		else:
			message "&4" to arg 1

command /weaponbuy <player=%player%> <text> <number> <text> <number>:
	permission: admin
	trigger:
		if arg 3 < {%arg 1%.g}:
			if arg 5 < {%arg 1%.%arg 4%}:
				set {%arg 1%.%arg 2%} to true
				remove arg 5 from {%arg 1%.%arg 4%}
				remove 1 from {%arg 1%.%arg 4%}
				remove arg 3 from {%arg 1%.g}
				remove 1 from {%arg 1%.g}
				broadcast "&e&l%arg 1%&a &b&l%arg 2% &a"
				message " " to arg 1
				message "&e&l%arg 2%&a" to arg 1
				message "&aweapon" to arg 1
				message " " to arg 1
				command "/playsound minecraft:entity.player.levelup ambient %arg 1% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 0.53 1.0"
				command "/playsound minecraft:entity.firework.launch ambient @a ~ ~ ~ 1.0 1.3 1.0"
			else:
				message "&4" to arg 1
		else:
			message "&4" to arg 1

command /magicbuy <player=%player%> <text> <number> <text> <number>:
	permission: admin
	trigger:
		if arg 2 < {%arg 1%.g}:
			if arg 4 < {%arg 1%.%arg 4%}:
				set {%arg 1%.%arg 2%} to true
				remove arg 5 from {%arg 1%.%arg 4%}
				remove 1 from {%arg 1%.%arg 3%}
				remove arg 3 from {%arg 1%.g}
				remove 1 from {%arg 1%.g}
				broadcast "&e&l%arg 1%&a &5&l%arg 2% &a"
				message " " to arg 1
				message "&e&l%arg 2%&a" to arg 1
				message "&amagic" to arg 1
				message " " to arg 1
				command "/playsound minecraft:entity.player.levelup ambient %arg 1% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 0.53 1.0"
				command "/playsound minecraft:entity.firework.launch ambient @a ~ ~ ~ 1.0 1.3 1.0"
			else:
				message "&4" to arg 1
		else:
			message "&4" to arg 1

command /custommenu <player=%player%>:
	trigger:
		open chest with 3 row named "&4&lKKR " to arg 1
		wait 1 tick
		command "/playsound minecraft:entity.arrow.hit_player ambient %arg 1% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 0.5 1.0"
		format slot 0 of arg 1 with arrow named "&e&lcustom &5&lArmor &a[&bLv.&e1&a]" to run [execute console command "/armor %arg 1% 1"]
		format slot 9 of arg 1 with arrow named "&e&lcustom &5&lweapon &a[&bLv.&e1&a]" to run [execute console command "/weapon %arg 1% 1"]
		format slot 18 of arg 1 with arrow named "&e&lcustom &5&lmagic &a[&bLv.&e1&a]" to run [execute console command "/magic %arg 1% 1"]
		stop

command /armor <player=%player%> <number>:
	trigger:
		wait 2 tick
		if arg 2 is 1:
			open chest with 1 row named "&4&lKKR custom Armor Lv.1" to arg 1
			wait 1 tick
			command "/playsound minecraft:entity.arrow.hit_player ambient %arg 1% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 0.5 1.0"
			if {%player%.} is "true":
				format slot 0 of arg 1 with leather_tunic named "&aLv&e1 &6" to run [execute console command "/armorselect %arg 1% "]
			else:
				format slot 0 of arg 1 with red glass named "&6???" to close
			if {%player%.} is "true":
				format slot 1 of arg 1 with feather named "&aLv&e1 &6" to run [execute console command "/armorselect %arg 1% "]
			else:
				format slot 1 of arg 1 with red glass named "&6???" to close
			stop

command /weapon <player=%player%> <number>:
	trigger:
		wait 2 tick
		if arg 2 is 1:
			open chest with 3 row named "&4&lKKR custom Weapon Lv.1" to arg 1
			wait 1 tick
			command "/playsound minecraft:entity.arrow.hit_player ambient %arg 1% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 0.5 1.0"
			if {%player%.} is "true":
				format slot 0 of arg 1 with wooden_sword named "&aLv&e1 &b" to run [execute console command "/weaponselect %arg 1% "]
			else:
				format slot 0 of arg 1 with red glass named "&b???" to close
			if {%player%.} is "true":
				format slot 1 of arg 1 with wooden_axe named "&aLv&e1 &b" to run [execute console command "/weaponselect %arg 1% "]
			else:
				format slot 1 of arg 1 with red glass named "&b???" to close
			stop

command /magic <player=%player%> <number>:
	trigger:
		wait 2 tick
		if arg 2 is 1:
			open chest with 3 row named "&4&lKKR custom magic Lv.1" to arg 1
			wait 1 tick
			command "/playsound minecraft:entity.arrow.hit_player ambient %arg 1% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 0.5 1.0"
			if {%player%.} is "true":
				format slot 0 of arg 1 with enchanted_book named "&aLv&e1 &5" to run [execute console command "/magicselect %arg 1% "]
			else:
				format slot 0 of arg 1 with red glass named "&5???" to close
			if {%player%.} is "true":
				format slot 1 of arg 1 with enchanted_book named "&aLv&e1 &5" to run [execute console command "/magicselect %arg 1% "]
			else:
				format slot 1 of arg 1 with red glass named "&5???" to close
			stop

command /armorselect <player=%player%> <text>:
	permission: admin
	trigger:
		set {%arg 1%.armor} to arg 2
		message " " to arg 1
		message "&6Armor &e%arg 2% &a" to arg 1
		message " " to arg 1

command /weaponselect <player=%player%> <text>:
	permission: admin
	trigger:
		set {%arg 1%.weapon} to arg 2
		message " " to arg 1
		message "&bWeapon &e%arg 2% &a" to arg 1
		message " " to arg 1

command /magicselect <player=%player%> <text>:
	permission: admin
	trigger:
		set {%arg 1%.magic} to arg 2
		message " " to arg 1
		message "&5Magic &e%arg 2% &a" to arg 1
		message " " to arg 1
